entries.abort: Abort code received, performing emergency hyperspace jump.
entries.arrived_at_loc: You are at the right coordinates pilot, the smuggler should be there momentarily.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Vessels on intercept course approaching, weapon systems armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < Sensors indicate no more fighter vessels with armed weapon systems in area. >
entries.complete: The smuggler is safe from here, nice flying out there pilot!
entries.failed_destroy: We lost contact with the smuggler, what happened? This is a hard blow to us pilot, we're already struggling with low resources.
entries.failed_protect: The smuggler had to do a emergency hyperspace jump, he didn't have enough protection. I hope he will be alright.
entries.found_loc: The next smuggler should meet you at these coordinates pilot.
entries.goodbye_1: Great working with ya mate, I'll be fine now!
entries.goodbye_3: Always nice to work with competent people, see you again sometime I hope!
entries.goodbye_4: Wouldn't have made it without you pilot, thanks!
entries.goodbye_5: I owe you a big one pilot, could never have made that on my own!
entries.hull_half: Crap, this thing is falling apart, I need some help!
entries.panic_2: Here they come, like a flock of angry mynocks!
entries.panic_3: They picked us up, incoming TIE fighters!
entries.panic_4: Oh @#!%, Imperial fighters heading our way!
entries.panic_5: Uh oh, these guys look pissed!
entries.quest_escort_d: Provide a safe escort for the smuggler. Stay close to him and keep your eyes open for any threats.
entries.quest_location_d: The Lok system has a low Imperial presence but they perform raids on pirates and rebels from time to time so be careful.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: You should now have the coordinates of the next smuggler in need of an escort, hurry over there.
entries.reason_1: Good to see ya mate! Lets get this show on the road.
entries.reason_2: Hi there pilot, you're my escort eh? Well I hope you're good.
entries.reason_3: Hi there, I have several wounded soldiers in the back, so hopefully this will be a smooth ride.
entries.reason_4: Greetings, keep up, I'm not waiting for anyone!
entries.reason_5: Hey there, we should be fine, just keep me covered in case things get hot.
entries.shields_depleted: Shields depleted! We're in trouble now!
entries.taunt_1: Do you Rebels think we're stupid? Lethal force allowed, proceed men.
entries.taunt_2: You Rebels made a mistake, you always do.
entries.taunt_3: We could see you Rebel fools miles away, Imperial justice doesn't let anything slip by!
entries.taunt_4: You couldn't smuggle sand to Tatooine, poor little Rebels.
entries.taunt_5: These Rebels actually thought they could get away with it. Use of lethal force is encour..approved.
entries.thanks_1: Nice work pilot! I thought they had us!
entries.thanks_2: I sure am glad you were here pilot.
entries.thanks_3: I knew I should have put wipers on this ship, there's TIE scraps all over my windshield.
entries.thanks_4: I wasn't even worried, nice going pilot!
entries.thanks_5: I don't think those guys knew what hit them, way to go!
entries.title: Lok system: Duty mission: Escort smugglers past Imperial patrols.
entries.title_d: Your orders are to provide a safe escort for Rebel and Nym smugglers in the Lok system. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship, yourself or that you have enough experience to continue your training, you can return to base at anytime.
